languages.text: {n}Злоба, светящаяся в глазах отродья, не оставляет сомнений — никакая преграда не смогла бы остановить его, ищущего способ совершить святотатство.{/n}
{n}The malice alight in the abomination's eyes leaves no doubt — no barrier could have stopped him, intent as he was on committing sacrilege.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Злоба, светящаяся в глазах отродья, не оставляет сомнений — никакая преграда не смогла бы остановить его, ищущего способ совершить святотатство.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The malice alight in the abomination's eyes leaves no doubt — no barrier could have stopped him, intent as he was committing sacrilege.{/n}

{n}The malice alight in the abomination's eyes leaves no doubt — no barrier could have stopped him, intent as he was on committing sacrilege.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La malicia que brilla en los ojos de la abominación no deja lugar a dudas: ninguna barrera podría haber detenido su irrefrenable impulso de cometer sacrilegio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The malice alight in the abomination's eyes leaves no doubt — no barrier could have stopped him, intent as he was on committing sacrilege.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La malicia que brilla en los ojos de la abominación no deja lugar a dudas: ninguna barrera podría haber detenido su irrefrenable impulso de cometer sacrilegio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}忌まわしき者の目に宿る悪意に疑いの余地はない。どんな障壁も彼を止めることはできなかった。彼は冒涜を犯すつもりだったのだから。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The malice alight in the abomination's eyes leaves no doubt — no barrier could have stopped him, intent as he was on committing sacrilege.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}忌まわしき者の目に宿る悪意に疑いの余地はない。どんな障壁も彼を止めることはできなかった。彼は冒涜を犯すつもりだったのだから。{/n}

languages.text: {n}那只怪物的目光中流露着确凿无疑的恶意。他一心渴望犯下亵渎神明的罪行，没有任何事情可以阻止他。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The malice alight in the abomination's eyes leaves no doubt — no barrier could have stopped him, intent as he was on committing sacrilege.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那只怪物的目光中流露着确凿无疑的恶意。他一心渴望犯下亵渎神明的罪行，没有任何事情可以阻止他。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Bosheit in den Augen der Abscheulichkeit lässt keine Zweifel offen ... keine Barriere hätte ihn aufhalten können, so begierig war er, ein Sakrileg zu begehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The malice alight in the abomination's eyes leaves no doubt — no barrier could have stopped him, intent as he was on committing sacrilege.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Bosheit in den Augen der Abscheulichkeit lässt keine Zweifel offen ... keine Barriere hätte ihn aufhalten können, so begierig war er, ein Sakrileg zu begehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le regard de l'abomination est animé d'une malveillance telle qu'aucun obstacle n'aurait pu l'empêcher de commettre un sacrilège.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The malice alight in the abomination's eyes leaves no doubt — no barrier could have stopped him, intent as he was on committing sacrilege.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard de l'abomination est animé d'une malveillance telle qu'aucun obstacle n'aurait pu l'empêcher de commettre un sacrilège.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaratığın gözlerindeki kötücül kıvılcım, şüpheye yer bırakmıyor. Bariyerler onu ve onun kutsala hürmetsizlik yapma amacını engelleyememiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The malice alight in the abomination's eyes leaves no doubt — no barrier could have stopped him, intent as he was on committing sacrilege.{/n}
